title: Interlude in the marshland = Uppehall i myrlandet
brief_description: Follows a restless train brakeman, played by Max Von Sydow, as he decides to abandon his train in a marshland and take a brief vacation from work. (Awards: A Blue Ribbon winner in the 1973 American Film Festival) Swedish dialogue, English subtitles.
